Articles.Content: There are three people: Your most trustworthy friend, a pregnant lady who has to go to the hospital, and the girl of your dreams. It's raining hard and your smart car only has two seats. What (do you) do?

Have your friend take the pregnant woman to the hospital.

Then, once the woman is safe, go out with the girl.
